summary: Completed comprehensive testing of SoulNutri app - Backend API (13/14 tests passed) and Frontend UI (all scenarios passed). The app successfully identifies dishes via image upload, displays nutritional info, allergens, ingredients, benefits, and supports buffet mode with consolidated plate view.

issues: Dish name 'Abóboraassada' appears without space - should be 'Abóbora Assada'

backend.test_identify_single_dish: PASS - Returns dish name, confidence, score

frontend.tutorial: PASS - Scanner tutorial displays and can be skipped
frontend.gallery_upload: PASS - File upload via gallery works
frontend.dish_info_display: PASS - Shows name, category, allergens, ingredients, benefits
frontend.back_button: PASS - Returns to camera view and clears result
frontend.buffet_add_to_plate: PASS - Can add items to plate
frontend.buffet_add_more_modal: PASS - Modal asks to add more or complete
frontend.mesa_consolidated_view: PASS - Shows consolidated nutritional info for all items
frontend.mobile_responsiveness: PASS - UI adapts well to mobile viewport

scenarios_tested.BUFFET: PASS - Can photograph multiple items, add to plate, see consolidated summary
scenarios_tested.A_LA_CARTE: PASS - Can photograph single dish and see all info without adding to plate
scenarios_tested.LANCHONETE: PASS - Quick info display works for single items
scenarios_tested.RESIDENCIA: PASS - Can identify ingredients/dishes being prepared
scenarios_tested.BACK_BUTTON: PASS - Works on all screens tested
scenarios_tested.INFO_DISPLAY: PASS - Shows name, category, allergens, ingredients, benefits, combinations

action_items: Minor: Fix dish name display - 'Abóboraassada' should have space 'Abóbora Assada'
Minor: Implement /api/ai/combinations endpoint or remove from tests
critical_code_review_comments: Good use of data-testid attributes for testing
Proper error handling for camera not available
Buffet flow with modal for adding more items works well
Consolidated 'Mesa' view shows all nutritional totals correctly
test_credentials: N/A - No authentication required for basic features
context_for_next_testing_agent: All core scenarios tested and working. Backend API /api/ai/identify returns complete dish info. Frontend buffet flow with 'Adicionar ao prato' and 'Mesa' consolidated view works. Mobile responsive. Camera not available in test environment (expected) but gallery upload works. The /api/ai/combinations endpoint is not implemented (404).
